response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to own something truly remarkable at a highly favorable rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
